abstract.text: is a general-purpose style tailored to outdoor activities.
The
style combines
the high-resolution satellite and aerial imagery of Mapbox Satellite with unobtrusive labels
and translucent roads from Mapbox Streets.
is a subtle, dark-colored backdrop for data visualizations.
is a subtle, light-colored backdrop for data visualizations.
